tool_description: Know the latest corona virus cases and numbers
name: CoronaVirus news update
title: CoronaVirus news update

api_list.name: Get coronavirus news from specific newspapers
api_list.description: This will return the news from specific newspaper which user requests through url
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-news-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/Guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-news-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-news-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-news-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all corona virus news
api_list.description: This will return all the news which includes coronavirus cases.
